subject: Re: [junit] Assert as a keyword in JDK1.4 Beta 2
msgSnippet: ... This should all be on one line.  The email client broke it in two. -- David Stagner National Marrow Donor Program 3001 Broadway Street NE Broadway Ridge
messageBody:
David Stagner wrote:
>
> Simply go to the top of your Java source code directory and run the
> following command:
>
> $ find . -name \*.java | xargs perl -i.bak -p -e
> 's/assert\(/assertTrue\(/g;'

This should all be on one line. The email client broke it in two.
--

David Stagner

National Marrow Donor Program

Broadway Ridge Suite 500
Minneapolis, MN 55413
